attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To promote science & engineering in schools by all possible means.   Science & engineering is the surest way to boost a country's economy long term and sigificantly improve living standards.   
   This means compulsory science subjects and maths at school with extra funding for science departments.   Public awareness advertising of science graduates wages and job prospects compared to non-science subjects.
   Industry needs more workers trained in science, engineering & maths.   We need to supply these workers to them to keep the UK competitive and prosperous.
